mapper.sql: LXR_ID, NAME, GENDER, GJ, YZ, GZDW, ZWZC, ZYLY, GLXM, EMAIL, FAX, TELPHONE, ADDRESS, REMARK, VALID, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from T_CMU_CONTACT
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from T_CMU_CONTACT where LXR_ID = #{lxrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VALID = 1
mapper.insert: insert into T_CMU_CONTACT (LXR_ID, NAME, GENDER, GJ, YZ, GZDW, ZWZC, ZYLY, GLXM, EMAIL, FAX, TELPHONE, ADDRESS, REMARK, VALID, CREATE_TIME ) values (#{lxrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gzdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zwzc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zyly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{glxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
